Text:
How many times? These things DO NOT AND CAN NOT SPEED UP ANY TORRENT.

AT WORST THEY UNSTABLIZE A PERFECTLY GOOD SETUP AND ACTUALLY SLOW THINGS DOWN.

What's the matter with you people!!!
Or even worse, they might even just be a ruse to infect you with a trojan horse.
One of my favourite games, thanks. :)
You can tell who just troll torrents leaving stupid nonsensical comments, since this isn't a game. And it's most likely junk.
